title: Tulsa Open
text:
The Tulsa Open was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Nationwide%20Tour">Nationwide Tour</a>. It ran from 1991 to 1992. It was played at <a href="Golf%20Course%20Of%20Oklahoma">Golf Course Of Oklahoma</a> in <a href="Broken%20Arrow%2C%20Oklahoma">Broken Arrow, Oklahoma</a>.
In 1992 the winner earned $30,000.
Winners.
Ben Hogan Tulsa Open
